title: Backdoor
description: Implemented a Backdoor using Python with an attempt to inject it on a target system on the same network through web and gain control of it remotely.

title: Track Your Corp
description: Track Your Corp shows you a list of corporations and their share details based on the keywords you enter into the search bar.

title: IOT Flow Data
description: A project on simulating data communication between client and server using hash, symmetric and asymmetric encryption techniques.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Yeah, I mean the same website you're on. I couldn't help but consider this one too as I believe it helped me dive into the world of responsive web design and learn so much more!

title: Smart Irrigation System
description: A small-scale IoT-based project on automated irrigation system that senses the environmental conditions and runs the water pump.

title: Mother's Recipe Portal
description: One of my earliest projects - A web-based portal to find your favourite recipes and even add your own for others to see.

title: Basic Payroll Application
description: Another one of my earliest projects - a web application for companies to keep track of their employees' salaries and manage the payroll system.
